title: Draven's unit collision
body:
Draven is a great champ, and is totally balanced... but i feel like his unit collision is ruining his laning stage... I would like to see Draven with no unit collision, like Kassadin... That would make him able to catch axes he would have missed otherwise, and even that small thing, would let draven to save mana more easily, and maybe save the mana for his ult... I believe that it would make him able to be more active, but only slightly

This isn't a game changing buff, it's just to make him abit easier to play.

Not that expensive if you know Draven has a passive.

his w lets him ignore collision. little known fact. also, the thing ruining draven is his 550 range, lack of meaningful lane presence and synergy with supports, weakness to ganks and tendency to push combined with inability to reset the wave off of enemy tower.

If you suggest removing Draven's unit collision, then it would be rational to remove it from the game. Every champ would benefit from its removal from the game. Otherwise, imo, Draven's unit collision should be kept.
